about_the_game:
This DLC contains 324 in-game scene + 9 ending scenes in full HD quality (1920x1080p), so you can set any of them as wallpaper for your PC Desktop.
Also we add all in-game music into this.
All scenes and OST you can find in game folder, open game properties in Steam, click "Show local files".
detailed_description:
This DLC contains 324 in-game scene + 9 ending scenes in full HD quality (1920x1080p), so you can set any of them as wallpaper for your PC Desktop.
Also we add all in-game music into this.
All scenes and OST you can find in game folder, open game properties in Steam, click "Show local files".

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any videocards
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core2Duo or higher
